name: Skyrider (ranyor)
description:
Submission for the GODOT WILD JAM #46. First time in a game jam

Used resources:

- Just Chromatic Aberration Shader by jecovier - https://godotshaders.com/shader/just-chromatic-aberration/

- Background Shader - star-nebula-shader - https://bitbucket.org/arlez80/star-nebula-shader/src/master/

- Particle Pack - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack

- Most SFX - https://sfxr.me/

- Music - Skyrider by Purple Motion
